body.pretty: ⊢ (if(c0 ∈(LinOp ⋂ ContOp), c0,(= |` ~H))∈(LinOp ⋂ ContOp)↔(if(c0 ∈(LinOp ⋂ ContOp), c0,(= |` ~H))∈ LinOp ∧ if(c0 ∈(LinOp ⋂ ContOp), c0,(= |` ~H))∈ ContOp))

comment: The norm of a continuous linear Hilbert space operator exists. Theorem 3.5(i) of [Beran] p. 99. (Contributed by NM, 7-Feb-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
